Package infodynamics.networkinference.interregional

This package contains classes for effective connectivity analysis at a regional level.

See the demo for interregional connectivity for more information.

Author:
Joseph Lizier (email, www)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InterregionalChannelMeasure
    Compute a significance score for an inter-regional channel measure between two sets, based on looking at the channel measure between elements taken jointVars1 and jointVars2 at a time.
    InterregionalMutualInfo
    Compute a significance score for the inter-regional mutual information between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.
    InterregionalTransferEntropy
    Compute a significance score for the inter-regional transfer entropy between two sets, based on looking at transfer between elements taken e at a time.
    MeasurementDistributionPermutationsOverSubsets
    Extends MeasurementDistribution for computations over large sets where we generate measures over permutations of subsets.
